LanguageData.BiotechTips.CallBossgroups: Mechanitors can summon powerful mechs. Fight them yourself - or draw them into your enemies.
LanguageData.BiotechTips.ChildrenBarracks: Children can sleep in the same room as parents and other children without any negative mood effect.
LanguageData.BiotechTips.NoxiousHaze: The more polluted nearby world tiles are, the more often you'll get acidic smog.
LanguageData.BiotechTips.CustomXenotypes: When starting a new game, you can create custom xenotypes with any genetic combination you want.
